Conversion Bear.description: Conversion Bear is a Shopify app providing trust badges and sticky add-to-cart features to enhance store credibility and streamline the purchasing process.

browser.detection: try { return typeof isshoptimized !== 'undefined'; } catch(e){ return ''; }

Shoptimized.description: Shoptimized is a Shopify theme and support package designed to enhance store functionality, performance, and user experience.
